mapper.sql: pb.break_bulk_id, pb.break_bulk_code, pb.work_order_id, pb.batch_no, pb.break_bulk_batch_qty, pb.status, pb.process_id, pb.organization_id, pb.create_time, pb.create_user_id, pb.modified_time, pb.modified_user_id, pb.is_delete, pb.break_bulk_type, bt.color, spm.product_model_name, bt.material_quality, wo.route_id, swo1.work_order_code AS 'parentWorkOrderCode'
mapper.select:
SELECT pb.batch_no as 'batchNo',pb.break_bulk_batch_qty as 'breakBulkBatchQty',sm.material_code as 'materialCode',sm.material_name as 'materialName',sm.version,sm.material_desc as 'materialDesc',sr.route_id as 'routeId',sr.route_name as 'routeName',pb.process_id as 'processId',s.user_name as 'modifiedUserName',bt.color AS 'color', spm.product_model_name AS 'productModelName', bt.material_quality AS 'materialQuality ' FROM mes_pm_break_bulk pb LEFT JOIN smt_work_order wo ON pb.work_order_id = wo.work_order_id LEFT join fantech_imes.smt_material sm on wo.material_id=sm.material_id LEFT JOIN base_tab bt on bt.material_id = sm.material_id left join smt_product_model spm on spm.product_model_id = bt.product_model_id LEFT join fantech_imes.smt_route sr on wo.route_id=sr.route_id LEFT join ocean.sys_user s on pb.modified_user_id=s.user_id
and pb.batch_no = #{batchNo}

SELECT u.user_name FROM qms_quality_confirmation qc LEFT JOIN smt_work_order_card_pool swocp ON qc.work_order_card_pool_id=swocp.work_order_card_pool_id LEFT join ocean.sys_user u on qc.create_user_id=u.user_id WHERE swocp.work_order_card_id=#{workOrderCardId} AND qc.process_id=#{processId} ORDER BY qc.quality_confirmation_code DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mes_pm_break_bulk_det bd LEFT JOIN mes_pm_break_bulk bb ON bd.break_bulk_id = bb.break_bulk_id WHERE bb.batch_no=#{batchNo}
